description:
The 2022 horror movie The Black Phone was an unprecedented success at the time of its release. Now director Scott Derrickson is returning for a sequel, appropriately-titled The Black Phone 2, and he is teasing that the follow-up is “more graphic” than its predecessor. As explained in an interview, this stems from one of the [...]

The post ‘The Black Phone 2’ Director Teases A “More Graphic” Sequel appeared first on ScreenGeek.
title: ‘The Black Phone 2’ Director Teases A “More Graphic” Sequel

description:
The Friday the 13th franchise’s next phase is expected to be Crystal Lake. The long-awaited television series has been in development for years. A24 is producing the show for a release on Peacock. Now a major update appears to be in the works. According to reports, none other than Linda Cardellini appears to be in [...]

The post Linda Cardellini Reportedly In Talks To Play Pamela Voorhees In ‘Crystal Lake’ appeared first on ScreenGeek.
title: Linda Cardellini Reportedly In Talks To Play Pamela Voorhees In ‘Crystal Lake’

description:
The Harry Potter franchise is expanding to include a new television series based on J.K. Rowling’s iconic books. The series will retell the events of the books following the original feature film adaptations that ran from 2001 to 2011. Now actor John Lithgow is reportedly being eyed to play Dumbledore in the new Harry Potter [...]

The post HBO Eyes John Lithgow As Dumbledore In ‘Harry Potter’ Series appeared first on ScreenGeek.
title: HBO Eyes John Lithgow As Dumbledore In ‘Harry Potter’ Series
